chamber_news.name: Business Opportunities & Connections
chamber_news.description: The Belize Chamber of Commerce (BCC) has a standing promotional agreement with ConnectAmericas which opens up another opportunity for you to connect with other businesses around the world and gain access to many free learning sessions in the format of trainings, meetings, forums, expos and as such. ConnectAmericas is a free business platform

chamber_news.name: CFLI Coordinator, BELIZE
chamber_news.description: The High Commission of Canada to Belize (located in Guatemala City) is offering a service contract for the coordination of the Canada Fund for Local Initiatives (CFLI) in Belize.
